tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE QuantumErrorCorrection (
    code_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    code_name VARCHAR(255),
    code_description TEXT,
    syndrome_type VARCHAR(50),
    syndrome_report TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Error_Logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    log_error_id INT NOT NULL,
    log_message TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (log_error_id) REFERENCES Syndrome_Errors(error_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CodeSyndromeMapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    code_id INT,
    syndrome_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (code_id) REFERENCES QuantumErrorCorrectionCodes(code_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (syndrome_id) REFERENCES QuantumSyndromes(syndrome_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SyndromeHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    syndrome_id INT,
    history_date DATE,
    history_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (syndrome_id) REFERENCES QuantumSyndromes(syndrome_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CodeStatistics (
    stats_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    code_id INT,
    stats_value INT,
    stats_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (code_id) REFERENCES QuantumErrorCorrectionCodes(code_id)
);
